text: Lionel Francis Garnett (1895-1983), was an Fijian lawn bowls international who competed in the 1950 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1950 British Empire Games he won the bronze medal in the singles event. ==References== Category:Fijian male bowls players Category:1895 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Bowls players at the 1950 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Fiji Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Lionel Garnett
